mapper.sql: id, creator, modifier, ctime, mtime, name, note, code
mapper.insert: insert into majordict (id, creator, modifier, ctime, mtime, name, note, code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into majordict
id,
creator,
modifier,
ctime,
mtime,
name,
note,
code,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update majordict
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update majordict set creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
